verses.text: \w And|strong="H6965"\w* Achitophel \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*: \w I|strong="H0310"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w twelve|strong="H6240"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w I|strong="H0310"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w arise|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w this|strong="H0376"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w coming|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* (\w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w now|strong="H0935"\w* \w weary|strong="H3023"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w weak|strong="H3605"\w* \w handed|strong="H3027"\w*) \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w defeat|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w put|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w flight|strong="H5127"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w kill|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w left|strong="H0935"\w* \w alone|strong="H0905"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*: \w for|strong="H0413"\w* thou seekest \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*: \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w saying|strong="H1697"\w* \w pleased|strong="H5869"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w But|strong="H8085"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* Chusai \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Arachite, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* saith.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0518"\w* Chusai \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*, \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: Achitophel hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w after|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w manner|strong="H1697"\w*: \w shall|strong="H2088"\w* \w we|strong="H0518"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w*? \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w counsel|strong="H1697"\w* dost thou \w give|strong="H0935"\w*?

\w And|strong="H6098"\w* Chusai \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* Achitophel hath \w given|strong="H3289"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w time|strong="H6471"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* again Chusai \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Thou knowest thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w very|strong="H3045"\w* \w valiant|strong="H1368"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w mind|strong="H5315"\w*, \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w bear|strong="H1677"\w* raging \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wood \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H0559"\w* whelps \w are|strong="H1992"\w* taken away: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w warrior|strong="H1368"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* lodge \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Perhaps \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* lieth \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w pits|strong="H6354"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w some|strong="H0259"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* list: \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w any|strong="H0259"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w first|strong="H0259"\w*, \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* heareth \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w There|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4046"\w* among \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* most \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w man|strong="H1368"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*, \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w melt|strong="H4549"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* fear: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w man|strong="H1368"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H0854"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* seemeth \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* good \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w*: \w Let|strong="H1980"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* thee, \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* Bersabee, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sand|strong="H2344"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* cannot \w be|strong="H3478"\w* numbered: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* midst \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* enter \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* cast \w ropes|strong="H2256"\w* round \w about|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* draw \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w river|strong="H5704"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w much|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* small \w stone|strong="H0834"\w* thereof.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Chusai \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Arachite \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Achitophel: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* profitable \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Achitophel \w was|strong="H3068"\w* defeated, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w might|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* Chusai \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Sadoc \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*: Thus \w and|strong="H3478"\w* thus did Achitophel \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* thus \w and|strong="H3478"\w* thus did \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4120"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: Tarry \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w this|strong="H6258"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w but|strong="H1571"\w* \w without|strong="H0408"\w* delay \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w*: \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w swallowed|strong="H1104"\w* \w up|strong="H1104"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0802"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w*, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w covering|strong="H4539"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w well|strong="H0875"\w*, \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H0802"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* dry sodden barley: \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w so|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w was|strong="H0802"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w*.
